name: The Wide Graveyard
description:
This hardly even qualifies as a game but hey, there are some real weirdos out there so perhaps one of them will play it.

CONTROLS

  • W/A/S/D - Walk
  • Mouse - Look
  • Space Bar - Jump
  • F11 - Toggle Fullscreen
  • Escape - Free Mouse

I used quite a few public domains assets in this so here are the links for those.

TEXTURES
